name: Talk to Strangers
description:
Talk to Strangers is a short game of everyday survival. Survive door to door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in this order) while trying to sell products to strangers. But beware: nothing is what it seems in this neighborhood.

  • Work for Sunny Morning™ and sell the most varied products!
  • What kinds of products, you ask? Do not worry about it, your role is to sell. :)
  • Put your small talk to good use: Each step of the conversation can increase or decrease your Anger, Depression and SALES!
  • Manage your money: Balance your spending between Motel costs and items that help you deal with Anger and Depression.
  • Eye on the clock!: Each step of the conversation passes the time, and time is a precious resource for the Seller!
